First off, let me just say this is the best Chinese food I've ever had in my life. The flavors are phenomenal.

Lan Zhou is my secret hole-in-the-wall gem! Easy to miss just by the OSU Union, this tasty and authentic restaurant offers just the perfect hot noodle soups...
